title: CESC 2017
body: Jae Kwon opens CESC 2017 with a keynote about Cosmos and cryptoeconomics. Find our booth at the Pauley Ballroom at UC Berkeley, California.

title: ETHWaterloo
body: Ethan Buchman will speak at ETHWaterloo about Cosmos & Tendermint. Find him at the Centre for International Governance Innovation (CIGI) in Waterloo, Canada.

title: M-0
body: Sunny Aggarwal, Research Scientist at Tendermint will be speaking at M-0 about Cosmos. Find him at Park Hotel in Zug, Switzerland.

title: Devcon3
body: The Cosmos team will be at Devcon3. Find our booth at the Cancún International Convention Center (ICC), Cancún, Mexico.

title: ETHUofT
body: At the 36-hour ETHUofT Hackathon, Ethereum enthusiasts and students will contribute to the ecosystem by solving real world problems with smart contracts. Ethan Buchman, CTO of Tendermint, will be giving a talk and judging projects.

title: C4YT Hackathon
body: Crypto 4 Your Thoughts is a hackathon focused on building new developer tools, improving cryptocurrency UX and fostering a strong, supportive and diverse open-source community. Jae Kwon, CEO of Tendermint, will be judging projects.

title: De/Centralize 2018
body: De/Centralize is Singapore’s premier blockchain conference examining the thematic interplay of decentralization and centralization in technology, economics and law. Adrian Brink, Head of Community at Tendermint, will be giving a talk.

title: BlockFin
body: BlockFin brings together innovators and exports from the blockchain ecosystem including platforms, companies, investors, and banks for 3 days. Cosmos has a booth - meet members from our team there!

title: she(256)
body: she(256) aims to empower women by highlighting existing diversity and by breaking down the barriers to entry in the blockchain space. Tendermint is sponsoring she(256) and women from the Tendermint team will managing the Cosmos booth!

title: EdCon
body: EdCon 2018 will cover the latest in Ethereum research, current trends, Ethereum based projects and apps, and community development. Tendermint is sponsoring EdCon. Jae Kwon, CEO of Tendermint, will be giving a talk.

title: ECF Tokyo
body: The aim of the Ethereum Community Fund is to encourage mainstream adoption by funding infrastructure and application development. Cosmos is a founding project of the ECF. THe first grant programs will be announced during this conference.

title: Blockchain Summit Latam 2018
body: A conference that seeks to bring the use of Blockchain technology closer to people, explaining the origin, adoption and potential for Latin America.

title: d10e Liberland 2018
body: d10e is the leading conference on decentralization, exploring the future of fintech, ICOs, blockchain, the sharing economy, the future of work, and disruptive culture. Sunny Aggarwal, Researcher at Tendermint, will be speaking.

title: Singidunum University International Scientific Conference
body: SINTEZA provides an ideal platform for the exchange of information and dissemination of best practices, advancements in the state-of-the-art and technical improvements in the domain of business related research in today's ubiquitous and virtual environment. Anton Kaliaev, Software Engineer at Tendermint, will be speaking.

title: Token Summit III
body: Token Summit is in New York again during May 16-17, 2018. We will continue to discuss the economics, regulation and best practices around blockchain-based tokens, protocols, and crypto-assets. Jae Kwon, founder and CEO of Tendermint will be speaking.

title: Women4Blockchain Hackathon
body: A gathering of business, legal, and technical minds to build new and innovative solutions on the blockchain. Join us for a weekend of workshopping, hacking, and creating, as we build the blockchain solutions — for the rest of the world to follow.

title: Cosmos Academy: Tendermint 101
body: In this lecture style meetup, we have invited guest speaker, Zarko Milosevic, Core Tendermint Research Scientist, to answer all your questions about Tendermint. This meetup is friendly to people at all levels of familiarity with blockchain protocols.

title: CPC Crypto DevCon
body: Thousands of developers from Google, Facebook, Apple, Linkedin, Uber and Airbnb are invited to attend the conference, and speakers include renowned crypto and distributed system professors as well as CTOs of top projects selected by Cryptic Labs, Stanford DTI and CPC. Jae Kwon, CEO of Tendermint, will be speaking.
